fields.title: Kitchen
fields.description: Wash the dishes, wipe off the counters, sweep the floor, mop the floor and take out the trash for the week.

fields.title: Bathroom
fields.description: scrub the tub, clean the sink,  clean the toilet, sweep the floor, mop the floor and take out the trash for the week.

fields.title: Yard Work
fields.description: mow the lawn, rake the leaves, water the plants, trim the hedges and pick up any trash in the yard
